atk-s0402a21:2_8: Saddhindriyaṁ adhimattaṁ hotīti samiddhattherassa kira arahattamaggakkhaṇe saddhindriyaṁ dhuraṁ ahosi,
atk-s0402a21:2_9: sesāni cattāri sahajātindriyāni tasseva parivārāni ahesuṁ.
atk-s0402a21:2_10: Iti thero attanā paṭividdhamaggaṁ kathento evamāha.
atk-s0402a21:2_11: Mahākoṭṭhikattherassa pana arahattamaggakkhaṇe samādhindriyaṁ dhuraṁ ahosi,
atk-s0402a21:2_12: sesāni cattāri indriyāni tasseva parivārāni ahesuṁ.
atk-s0402a21:2_13: Tasmā sopi samādhindriyaṁ adhimattanti kathento attanā paṭividdhamaggameva kathesi.
atk-s0402a21:2_14: Sāriputtattherassa pana arahattamaggakkhaṇe paññindriyaṁ dhuraṁ ahosi.
atk-s0402a21:2_15: Sesāni cattāri indriyāni tasseva parivārāni ahesuṁ.
atk-s0402a21:2_16: Tasmā sopi paññindriyaṁ adhimattanti kathento attanā paṭividdhamaggameva kathesi.
atk-s0402a21:3_3: Evametasmiṁ sutte tīhipi therehi attanā paṭividdhamaggova kathito,
atk-s0402a21:5_3: Neva vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhāti iminā atekicchena vātāpamārādinā rogena samannāgato niṭṭhāpattagilāno kathito.
atk-s0402a21:5_4: Vuṭṭhāti tamhā ābādhāti iminā khipitakakacchutiṇapupphakajarādibhedo appamattaābādho kathito.
atk-s0402a21:5_5: Labhanto sappāyāni bhojanāni no alabhantoti iminā pana yesaṁ paṭijagganena phāsukaṁ hoti,
atk-s0402a21:5_7: Ettha ca patirūpo upaṭṭhāko nāma gilānupaṭṭhākaaṅgehi samannāgato paṇḍito dakkho analaso veditabbo.
atk-s0402a21:5_9: Tasmiñhi gilāne attano dhammatāya yāpetuṁ asakkonte bhikkhusaṅghena tassa bhikkhuno eko bhikkhu ca sāmaṇero
atk-s0402a21:5_12: tāva gilānassa ca tesañca dvinnaṁ yenattho,
atk-s0402a21:6_0: Aññepi gilānā upaṭṭhātabbāti itarepi dve gilānā upaṭṭhāpetabbā.
atk-s0402a21:6_5: Na kho pana maṁ paṭijaggantī”ti manopadosaṁ katvā apāye nibbatteyya.
atk-s0402a21:6_6: Paṭijaggiyamānassa panassa evaṁ hoti “bhikkhusaṅghena yaṁ kātabbaṁ,
atk-s0402a21:6_9: So bhikkhusaṅghe mettaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā sagge nibbattissati.
atk-s0402a21:6_10: Yo pana appamattakena byādhinā samannāgato labhantopi alabhantopi vuṭṭhātiyeva,
atk-s0402a21:6_11: tassa vināpi bhesajjena vūpasamanabyādhi bhesajje kate khippataraṁ vūpasammati.
atk-s0402a21:6_12: So tato buddhavacanaṁ vā uggaṇhituṁ sakkhissati,
atk-s0402a21:7_1: Niyāmaṁ kusalesu dhammesu sammattanti kusalesu dhammesu magganiyāmasaṅkhātaṁ sammattaṁ.
atk-s0402a21:7_3: Dutiyavārena ugghaṭitaññū gahito sāsane nālakattherasadiso buddhantare ekavāraṁ paccekabuddhānaṁ santike
atk-s0402a21:8_0: Dhammadesanā anuññātāti māsassa aṭṭha vāre dhammakathā anuññātā.
atk-s0402a21:8_1: Aññesampi dhammo desetabboti itaresampi dhammo kathetabbo.
atk-s0402a21:8_3: Padaparamassa hi imasmiṁ attabhāve dhammaṁ paṭivijjhituṁ asakkontassāpi anāgate paccayo bhavissati.
atk-s0402a21:8_4: Yo pana tathāgatassa rūpadassanaṁ labhantopi alabhantopi dhammavinayañca savanāya labhantopi alabhantopi dhammaṁ abhisameti,
atk-s0402a21:8_6: Labhanto pana khippameva abhisamessatīti iminā kāraṇena tesaṁ dhammo desetabbo.
atk-s0402a21:10_3: Abhisaṅkharotīti āyūhati rāsiṁ karoti piṇḍaṁ karoti.
atk-s0402a21:10_6: Sabyābajjhā phassā phusantīti sadukkhā vipākaphassā phusanti.
atk-s0402a21:10_9: Seyyathāpi sattā nerayikāti yathā niraye nibbattasattā ekantadukkhaṁ vedanaṁ vediyanti,
atk-s0402a21:10_11: Kiṁ pana tattha upekkhāvedanā natthīti? Atthi,
atk-s0402a21:10_12: dukkhavedanāya pana balavabhāvena sā abbohārikaṭṭhāne ṭhitā.
atk-s0402a21:10_13: Iti nirayova nirayassa upamaṁ katvā āhaṭo.
atk-s0402a21:11_0: Seyyathāpi devā subhakiṇhāti idhāpi devalokova devalokassa upamaṁ katvā āhaṭo.
atk-s0402a21:11_1: Yasmā pana heṭṭhimesu brahmalokesu sappītikajjhānavipāko vattati,
atk-s0402a21:11_4: Iti ayampi tatra paṭibhāgaupamā nāmāti veditabbā.
atk-s0402a21:12_1: Seyyathāpi manussāti manussānaṁ hi kālena sukhaṁ hoti,
atk-s0402a21:12_6: Tesaṁ hi hīnatarānaṁ mahesakkhatarā devatā disvā āsanā vuṭṭhātabbaṁ hoti,
atk-s0402a21:12_9: añjalikammaṁ kātabbanti taṁ sabbampi dukkhaṁ nāma hoti.
atk-s0402a21:12_11: Te hi kālena sampattiṁ anubhavanti kālena kammanti vokiṇṇasukhadukkhāva honti.
atk-s0402a21:12_12: Iti imasmiṁ sutte tīṇi sucaritāni lokiyalokuttaramissakāni kathitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0402a21:14_6: Saraṇaṁ gato hotīti avassayaṁ gato hoti.
atk-s0402a21:14_9: Idañca pana saraṇagamanaṁ aggahitasaraṇapubbassa akatābhinivesassa vasena vuttaṁ.
atk-s0402a21:14_10: Iti imasmiṁ sutte saraṇadāyako sotāpattimaggasampāpako arahattamaggasampāpakoti tayo ācariyā bahukārāti āgatā,
atk-s0402a21:14_11: pabbajjādāyako buddhavacanadāyako kammavācācariyo sakadāgāmimaggasampāpako anāgāmimaggasampāpakoti ime ācariyā na āgatā,
atk-s0402a21:14_18: upari dve maggā ca phalāni ca arahattamaggasannissitānīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0402a21:15_1: Na suppatikāraṁ vadāmīti patikāraṁ kātuṁ na sukaranti vadāmi.
atk-s0402a21:15_2: Abhivādanādīsu anekasatavāraṁ anekasahassavārampi hi pañcapatiṭṭhitena nipatitvā vandanto āsanā vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0402a21:15_3: paccuggacchanto diṭṭhadiṭṭhakkhaṇe añjaliṁ paggaṇhanto anucchavikaṁ sāmīcikammaṁ karonto divase divase
atk-s0402a21:15_4: cīvarasataṁ cīvarasahassaṁ piṇḍapātasataṁ piṇḍapātasahassaṁ dadamāno cakkavāḷapariyantena sabbaratanamayaṁ
atk-s0402a21:15_5: āvāsaṁ karonto sappinavanītādinānappakāraṁ bhesajjaṁ anuppadajjamāno neva sakkoti ācariyena katassa patikāraṁ
atk-s0402a21:17_16: Purāṇavaṇo hi attano dhammatāyeva pubbaṁ lohitaṁ yūsanti imāni tīṇi savati,
atk-s0402a21:18_2: tassa attano dhammatāya savanaṁ viya kodhanassapi attano dhammatāya uddhumātassa viya caṇḍikatassa caraṇaṁ,
atk-s0402a21:18_3: kaṭṭhena vā kaṭhalāya vā ghaṭṭanaṁ viya appamattaṁ vacanaṁ,
atk-s0402a21:18_4: bhiyyosomattāya savanaṁ viya “mādisaṁ nāma esa evaṁ vadatī”ti bhiyyosomattāya uddhumāyanabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0402a21:19_3: cakkhumā puriso viya hi yogāvacaro daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a21:19_6: vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa samantā rūpadassanaṁ viya sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṁ,
atk-s0402a21:19_9: vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa samantā rūpadassanaṁ viya sakadāgāmimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṁ,
atk-s0402a21:19_12: vijjantarikāya cakkhumato purisassa samantā rūpadassanaṁ viya anāgāmimaggakkhaṇe nibbānadassanaṁ veditabbaṁ.
atk-s0402a21:20_3: vajirassa maṇigaṇṭhimpi vā pāsāṇagaṇṭhimpi vā vinivijjhitvā agamanabhāvassa natthitā viya arahattamaggañāṇena acchejjānaṁ kilesānaṁ natthibhāvo,
atk-s0402a21:20_4: vajirena nibbiddhavedhassa puna apatipūraṇaṁ viya arahattamaggena chinnānaṁ kilesānaṁ puna anuppādo daṭṭhabboti.
atk-s0402a21:22_4: Sakkatvā garuṁ katvāti sakkārañceva garukārañca katvā.
atk-s0402a21:22_5: Hīno hoti sīlenātiādīsu upādāyupādāya hīnatā veditabbā.
atk-s0402a21:22_6: Tattha yo hi pañca sīlāni rakkhati,
atk-s0402a21:22_7: so dasa sīlāni rakkhantena na sevitabbo.
atk-s0402a21:22_10: Aññatra anuddayā aññatra anukampāti ṭhapetvā anuddayañca anukampañca.
atk-s0402a21:22_11: Attano atthāyeva hi evarūpo puggalo na sevitabbo,
atk-s0402a21:23_0: Sīlasāmaññagatānaṁ satanti sīlena samānabhāvaṁ gatānaṁ santānaṁ.
atk-s0402a21:23_1: Sīlakathāca no bhavissatīti evaṁ samānasīlānaṁ amhākaṁ sīlameva ārabbha kathā bhavissati.
atk-s0402a21:23_2: Sā ca no pavattinī bhavissatīti sā ca amhākaṁ kathā divasampi kathentānaṁ pavattissati na paṭihaññissati.
atk-s0402a21:23_3: Sā ca no phāsu bhavissatīti sā ca divasampi pavattamānā sīlakathā amhākaṁ phāsuvihāro sukhavihāro bhavissati.
atk-s0402a21:24_1: Tattha tattha paññāya anuggahessāmīti ettha sīlassa asappāye anupakāradhamme vajjetvā sappāye upakāradhamme
atk-s0402a21:24_2: sevanto tasmiṁ tasmiṁ ṭhāne sīlakkhandhaṁ paññāya anuggaṇhāti nāma.
atk-s0402a21:24_4: Nihīyatīti attano hīnataraṁ puggalaṁ sevanto khāraparissāvane āsittaudakaṁ viya satataṁ samitaṁ hāyati parihāyati.
atk-s0402a21:24_8: Tasmā attano uttariṁ bhajethāti yasmā seṭṭhaṁ puggalaṁ upanamanto udeti khippaṁ,
atk-s0402a21:26_2: Atha kho nanti atha kho assa.
atk-s0402a21:26_4: Evameva khoti ettha gūthakūpo viya dussīlyaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-s0402a21:26_5: Gūthakūpe patitvā ṭhito dhammaniahi viya dussīlapuggalo.
atk-s0402a21:26_6: Gūthakūpato uddhariyamānena tena ahinā purisassa sarīraṁ āruḷhenāpi adaṭṭhabhāvo viya dussīlaṁ sevamānassāpi tassa kiriyāya akaraṇabhāvo.
atk-s0402a21:26_7: Sarīraṁ gūthena makkhetvā ahinā gatakālo viya dussīlaṁ sevamānassa pāpakittisaddaabbhuggamanakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a21:27_1: Bhiyyosomattāya cicciṭāyatīti taṁ hi jhāyamānaṁ pakatiyāpi papaṭikāyo muñcantaṁ cicciṭāti “ciṭiciṭā”ti saddaṁ karoti,
atk-s0402a21:27_3: Evameva khoti evamevaṁ kodhano attano dhammatāyapi uddhato caṇḍikato hutvā carati,
atk-s0402a21:27_4: appamattakaṁ pana vacanaṁ sutakāle “mādisaṁ nāma evaṁ vadati evaṁ vadatī”ti atirekataraṁ uddhato caṇḍikato hutvā carati.
atk-s0402a21:27_8: Tasmā evarūpo puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabboti yasmā kodhano atiseviyamāno atiupasaṅkamiyamānopi kujjhatiyeva,
atk-s0402a21:27_10: Tasmā palālaggi viya ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo.
atk-s0402a21:27_16: Anupasaṅkamitvā apaṭikkamitvā pana majjhattabhāvena tappantassa sītaṁ vūpasammati,
atk-s0402a21:27_17: tasmā palālaggi viya kodhano puggalo majjhattabhāvena ajjhupekkhitabbo,
atk-s0402a21:27_18: na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupāsitabbo.
atk-s0402a21:30_1: Aṭṭhame gūthabhāṇīti yo gūthaṁ viya duggandhakathaṁ katheti.
atk-s0402a21:30_2: Pupphabhāṇīti yo pupphāni viya sugandhakathaṁ katheti.
atk-s0402a21:30_3: Madhubhāṇīti yo madhu viya madhurakathaṁ katheti.
atk-s0402a21:30_12: Attahetu vā parahetu vāti attano vā parassa vā hatthapādādihetu vā dhanahetu vā.
atk-s0402a21:30_13: Āmisakiñcikkhahetu vāti ettha āmisanti lañjo adhippeto.
atk-s0402a21:30_14: Kiñcikkhanti yaṁ vā taṁ vā appamattakaṁ antamaso tittiriyavaṭṭakasappipiṇḍanavanītapiṇḍādimattakassa lañjassa hetūti attho.
atk-s0402a21:30_15: Sampajānamusā bhāsitā hotīti jānantoyeva musāvādaṁ kattā hoti.
atk-s0402a21:31_6: Atthamadhuratāya sakalasarīre kopaṁ ajanetvā pemaṁ janetīti pemanīyā.
atk-s0402a21:31_7: Hadayaṁ gacchati appaṭihaññamānā sukhena cittaṁ pavisatīti hadayaṅgamā.
atk-s0402a21:31_16: Evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti bahujanakantā.
atk-s0402a21:31_17: Kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuddhikarāti bahujanamanāpā.
atk-s0402a21:33_1: Navame cakkhu na hotīti paññācakkhu na hoti.
atk-s0402a21:33_5: Kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāgeti kaṇhasukkāyeva aññamaññaṁ paṭibāhanato paṭipakkhavasena sappaṭibhāgāti vuccanti.
atk-s0402a21:34_0: Na ceva bhogā tathārūpāti tathājātikā bhogāpissa na honti.
atk-s0402a21:34_1: Na ca puññāni kubbatīti puññāni ca na karoti.
atk-s0402a21:34_2: Ettāvatā bhoguppādanacakkhuno ca puññakaraṇacakkhuno ca abhāvo vutto.
atk-s0402a21:34_3: Ubhayattha kaliggāhoti idhaloke ca paraloke cāti ubhayasmimpi aparaddhaggāho,
atk-s0402a21:34_5: Atha vā ubhayattha kaliggāhoti ubhayesampi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikānaṁ atthānaṁ kaliggāho,
atk-s0402a21:34_11: musāvādena cūbhayanti theyyādīsu ubhayena pariyesatīti attho. Kathaṁ?
atk-s0402a21:34_20: Na socatīti yasmiṁ ṭhāne antosokena na socati.
atk-s0402a21:36_7: Itissa te dhammaṁ kathentā pubbapaṭṭhapanepi kalyāṇaṁ bhaddakaṁ anavajjameva katvā kathenti,
atk-s0402a21:36_11: Tattha desanāya tāva catuppadikagāthāya paṭhamapadaṁ ādi,
atk-s0402a21:36_18: tato paraṁ eko vā aneke vā majjhaṁ,
atk-s0402a21:36_33: Dve dve vā kayiramāne sīlasamādhayo ādi,
atk-s0402a21:37_3: Parisuddhanti parisuddhaṁ nijjaṭaṁ niggaṇṭhiṁ katvā desenti.
atk-s0402a21:37_4: Brahmacariyaṁ pakāsentīti evaṁ desentā ca seṭṭhacariyabhūtaṁ sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṁ ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ pakāsenti.
atk-s0402a21:37_5: Neva ādiṁ manasi karotīti neva pubbapaṭṭhapanaṁ manasi karoti.
atk-s0402a21:38_2: Evameva khoti ettha kumbho nikujjo viya avakujjapañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a21:38_4: udakassa vivaṭṭanakālo viya tasmiṁ āsane nisinnassa uggahetuṁ asamatthakālo,
atk-s0402a21:38_5: udakassa asaṇṭhānakālo viya vuṭṭhahitvā asallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a21:39_2: Evameva khoti ettha ucchaṅgo viya ucchaṅgapañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a21:39_4: ucchaṅge nānākhajjakāni khādantassa nisinnakālo viya tasmiṁ āsane nisinnassa uggaṇhanakālo,
atk-s0402a21:39_5: vuṭṭhahantassa satisammosā pakiraṇakālo viya tasmā āsanā vuṭṭhāya gacchantassa asallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a21:40_2: Evameva khoti ettha uparimukho ṭhapito kumbho viya puthupañño puggalo daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0402a21:40_4: udakassa saṇṭhānakālo viya tattha nisinnassa uggaṇhanakālo,
atk-s0402a21:40_5: no vivaṭṭanakālo viya vuṭṭhāya gacchantassa sallakkhaṇakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0402a21:41_3: Seyyo etena vuccatīti etasmā puggalā uttaritaroti vuccati.
atk-s0402a21:41_4: Dhammānudhammappaṭipannoti navalokuttaradhammassa anudhammaṁ saha sīlena pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno.
atk-s0402a21:41_6: Antakaro siyāti koṭikaro paricchedakaro parivaṭumakaro bhaveyyāti.
